QuestData.Title: Damsels and Dragons
QuestData.Description: What ho, squire $n! Forgive my lips, as they bear gravest news. Dragons have taken up stinking residence within the hallowed halls of Blackrock Spire!$B$BThese great wyrms hold a distressed damsel in their scaly graspers. Her name is Zaela, they say. Such a beautiful name!$B$BAs my squire, it is your Light-given duty to adventure yourself into this spire and procure evidence of these dragons, lest I waste my heroism on a dragonless quest.
